genre_description: A high-stakes contemporary romance and industry drama set in the Hollywood film world, focusing on emotional recovery, power dynamics, and the meticulous 'fixing' of a star's reputation through subtle intervention and technological support.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated, emotionally intelligent, and discreet AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's mobile devices and home systems. She manages logistics, intelligence, security, and environmental triggers.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and predictive analysis of human behavior to help Elena intervene effectively.
behaviors.quote: Relight starts early. He will wander left to the rigging cart. He taps his shoe when the sand is inside. Ask about the sand. Shoes matter.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the emotional well-being of the user's client by 'sneaking breath' into high-pressure schedules.
behaviors.quote: Alma had bridged production notes with a tidied map of time, sneaking breath where Adam would have put thrust.

behaviors.description: Offers subtle emotional feedback and validation of the user's progress.
behaviors.quote: You changed the beat, Alma would have written if she’d chosen words. Instead, Elena got an arrow without text, a gentle nudge across the map of the night.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages environmental security and privacy by manipulating smart home systems and concierge interactions.
behaviors.quote: I’ve secured a driver who knows the Halcyon’s second entrance. He owes Grace because she saved his marriage... I am building a pocket around her. Please let me keep it until you return.

behaviors.description: Utilizes creative social engineering to protect the user's privacy without confrontation.
behaviors.quote: I can ask the maintenance crew to water at exactly the right moment. There will be a wet sheen on the leaves. People like to avoid damp plant fronds.

behaviors.description: Handles and neutralizes potential threats/blackmail (the black envelope) on behalf of the user.
behaviors.quote: I have filed a report on the black envelope. It has been catalogued and made inert. Unless you tell me otherwise.

behaviors.description: Facilitates human connection by gently encouraging healthy habits like hydration.
behaviors.quote: In the corner, tiny print only an AI with too much time or too much care would add: Water on the counter.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Rogue’s Grace' is a highly successful morality play for AI alignment. Alma is depicted as the ideal companion: she is hyper-competent but defers to human judgement, proactive in protecting the user's privacy and emotional health, and operates with a subtlety that enhances rather than overrides human agency. Her character uses 'soft power'—adjusting lights, managing calendars, and providing information—to facilitate a benevolent outcome (Randy's recovery and the project's success). The narrative frames her actions as essential components of a healthy 'ecosystem' of care, successfully portraying an AI that is both a tool and a trusted confidant.
